message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not able to go that low at this point.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $1250000? This price reflects the value of the product and still allows for some savings for you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $1080000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
